name: HedgeSome
description:
HedgeSome is a top-down casual puzzle game about a spirit of a Hedgehog helping other creatures find their lost items inside of the hedge maze. 

Game created during Global Game Jam 2021 - local jam hub KrakJam. Fully created in Unreal Engine 4.

Credits: 
David Mihok - Game Designer, Programmer
Daniel Marszałek - Game Designer, Programmer
Laura Czyż - Artist, Game Designer
Wiktoria Wacławek - Producer, Game Designer

Featuring Royalty Free Music from Bensound

Instructions

To move use WSAD (release key to move one tile). Use E to interact with NPC's and items.
